## IMinifierConnection interface

Metadata from the minifier for the plugin

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IMinifierConnection
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                 | Type   | Description                                                                                            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [configHash](./module-minifier-plugin.iminifierconnection.confighash.md) | string | Hash of the configuration of this minifier, to be applied to the webpack chunk and compilation hashes. |

## Methods

| Method                                                                     | Description                                        |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| [disconnect()](./module-minifier-plugin.iminifierconnection.disconnect.md) | Callback to be invoked when done with the minifier |
